title: Anime Review: One Piece 497-499
author: populationgo
description: A review of One Piece episodes 497-499, discussing how the brothers reunite after weeks apart and meet Naguri at his campground in Gray Terminal. The review notes that One Piece excels at character development, particularly highlighting Dadan's character growth during this arc.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the entire Post-War Arc

title: One Piece Episode #499 Review
author: The Fandom Post
description: A review of Episode 499 noting that One Piece was in a frustrating area for many fans due to the extended flashback arc. However, the episode helps the boys grow and learn, becoming more men than they were before.

title: One Piece – Post War Arc (Episodes 493 – 516) Review
author: Hogan Reviews
description: A comprehensive review of the entire Post-War Arc. Notes that episodes 497-499 are rare One Piece pure filler episodes, spending more time with the three brothers before episode 500 gets back on track with canon material.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the entire Post-War Arc including the Gray Terminal fire and Sabo's fate

title: 499-504: 'The Battle Against the Big Tiger! Who Is Going to Be Captain?!' and more
author: Never Watched One Piece
description: A detailed recap and analysis of episodes 499-504, covering the tiger battle, the nobles' plot against Gray Terminal, the fire incident, and Sabo's departure. Written from the perspective of someone watching One Piece for the first time.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers through episode 504 including the Gray Terminal fire and Sabo's apparent death

title: SABO DESERVES BETTER! One Piece REACTION | Episode 499 & 500
author: Unknown Reactor
description: A reaction video covering episodes 499 and 500, with strong emotional reactions to the brotherhood between Ace, Sabo, and Luffy, and the foreshadowing of tragedy to come.

title: SOMEONE Eliminate This Kid...ALSO 500 EPISODES DEEP - One Piece Episode 499 + 500 REACTION + REVIEW!
author: Unknown Reactor
description: A combined reaction and review of episodes 499-500, celebrating reaching 500 episodes while reacting to the tiger battle and the setup for the Gray Terminal tragedy.

title: One Piece Episode 499 UNCUT REACTION!
author: BOLDcast
description: An uncut reaction to One Piece episode 499, featuring the tiger battle and Naguri's departure.

title: One Piece Eps 499-500 REACTIONS! (Edited)
author: Carlie & Ange
description: Edited reaction video to episodes 499-500 by the Carlie & Ange reaction channel.
